# Release Notes Template

## Version
- Tag: vX.Y[-codename]
- Capability milestone:
- Summary:

## Changes
- Features:
- Improvements:
- Fixes:
- Refactors:
- Config/Docs:

## Files Changed (high-signal only)
- path/to/file1: what changed (1 line)
- path/to/file2: what changed (1 line)

## Backwards Compatibility
- Breaking changes:
- Migration steps:

## Verification
- Tests:
- Demos:

## Notes
- Known issues:
- Follow-ups:
